feed.title: CTV+CSFS: Can we reach consensus on a first step towards covenants?

entry.title: CTV+CSFS: Can we reach consensus on a first step towards covenants?
entry.summary: I'm sorry, but it seems there might have been a misunderstanding. I need the actual content or details of the email or topic you're referring to for me to provide a summarized blog post based on the rules you've listed. Could you please provide more information or clarify the context you'd like summarized?
